title: New BITMAIN Antminer L7 9050M ASIC Miner (0.36J/TH, 3260W, 220V), Best Air-Cooling High Productive Litecoin/Dogecoin Home Mining Machines, w/Power Supply
body_html:
Brand: Antminer

Features:

  • 【Unmatched Hashrate Power】 Delivering a remarkable 9050 MH/s ±3% hashrate, these miners are engineered to maximize your LTC and DOGE mining efficiency, ensuring higher returns with every block mined.
  • 【Energy Efficiency at Its Best】 Designed for optimal performance, these units operate at an impressive 0.36 J/TH ±10% power efficiency. Save on electricity costs while increasing mining profitability, thanks to the low energy consumption of 3260W ±10%.
  • 【Dual Crypto Mining Capability】 Leverage the efficient Scrypt algorithm to mine both Litecoin (LTC) and Dogecoin (DOGE) simultaneously. Boost your mining output and diversify your crypto portfolio with one device for multiple cryptocurrencies.
  • 【Efficient Cooling & Durability】 Designed with advanced cooling technology to maintain optimal temperatures even under continuous operation. Miners can withstand the heat, ensuring longevity and stable performance in demanding mining environments.
  • ※IMPORTANT※ For brand new BITMAIN Antminer units, if the return is not due to product quality issues, a 40% restocking fee will be applied. Please carefully consider your purchase before making a decision.

Binding: Personal Computers

Details: ※IMPORTANT※
Brand New BITMAIN Antminer units come with warranty coverage provided by BITMAIN. We are not responsible for the warranty; therefore, customers are required to proactively contact BITMAIN's official website, where dedicated personnel will assist you.

The power cord was NOT INCLUDED in the package originally. Please use 220-277V Voltage; wrong input voltage may probably cause miner damage.
